name: Anse Lazio: The Siren's Whisper
scene: Twilight surf with glowing plankton. 3 black parrots wheel above 2 broken oars; 7 lanterns bob on the swell. Fisherman Jacques warns: 'Not all tides bring gifts.'
riddle: Count the wings that watch the oars that broke—sail where seven fires float.

renderSpec.prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of Twilight surf with glowing plankton. 3 black parrots wheel above 2 broken oars; 7 lanterns bob on the swell. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. foreground_parrots_midground_oars_background_surf. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: seychellois_fisherman, traditional_lanterns. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene.
